about_the_game:
Attention: This game contains graphics that may cause discomfort and are unsuitable for younger audiences.

Unlike others, we have a gift. To know what life is and to understand what makes us alive. But, like everything else, we decided to destroy that gift too. We started changing life as we see fit, and the energy that gives us life, we corrupted it and destroyed it... The question remains, Is it too late for our salvation?



ABOUT THE GAME

After the life energy transfer into a body of a young wolf, you set out to stop a person on the verge of destroying the planet. A person addressed as Butcher.

Gameplay: Horror adventure game
Theme: Fantasy, Sci-fi, Dark fairytale, Horror
Languages: English
Developed in: RPG Maker MZ
Platform: Windows

"At the dream end" is a sci-fi story about a young wolf and a scientist involved in terrible biological experiments. It is a 2D interactive horror story made in RPG Maker MZ.

Gameplay: Explore stages and solve puzzles. A bonus part of the story awaits anyone who thoroughly explores "At the dream end" world.

FEATURES

Lore-rich world
Multiple endings
Head-scratching puzzles
Immersive atmosphere
Incredible sci-fi and fantasy digital art
A reward for players who love to explore

AT THE DREAM END short story is available via "View the quick reference" option on the page.

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes (not very often) have blood and animal cruelty in them.

legal_notice:
Note: The base images for digital art included in this game/book are made with Midjourney A.I. and are free to use. But since the images in this game are modified for the purpose of the game, only discord versions of images are free for use. Images used directly from At the Dream End game/book are prohibited for commercial or non-commercial use.

Privacy Policy link: https://mmmindiegames.blogspot.com/p/privacy-policy.html
name: At the dream end Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 340 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 340 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: After mind transfer into a body of a young wolf-human hybrid, you set out to stop a person on the verge of destroying our planet. A person addressed as Butcher.
